name: Insurance Broker Management System
short_description:
IBMS - Insurance Brokerage Management System is developed to make insurance brokerage operations easy to manage. IBMS has inbuilt systems that manages: direct and agency bill general ledger accounting, insurance tracking for payments made by clients, client policies, underwriters, and period. Even more, IBMS generates debit and credit invoices, balance payments, etc.

Other functions and benefits of IBMS include:

    Automatically generates entire accounting picture
    Provides direct bill reconciliation.
    Provides comprehensive policy management and X-date tracking.
    Provides complete client account receivables with invoicing and statements
    Track all accounts and print checks.
    Attach any file type to clients' files.
    Manage any user's schedule by providing tickler/calendar subsystem with pop-up alarms.

IBMS will simply make you love your insurance brokerage operations. Simple & easy is the style!
summary: Is developed to make insurance brokerage operations easy to manage
